description: Police are investigating insults against April Benayoum after she revealed her Israeli origins.
title: Miss France runner-up April Benayoum targeted by anti-Semitic tweets
title_page: Miss France runner-up April Benayoum targeted by anti-Semitic tweets - BBC News
maintext: "It is sad to witness such behaviour in 2020," said Ms Benayoum, who represented the south-eastern region of Provence in the contest. "I obviously condemn these comments, but it does not affect me at all."
